languages.text: {n}В логове царит атмосфера неискреннего предвкушения праздника. Лица у всех кислые, улыбки — натянутые, и даже бутылки с выпивкой, виднеющиеся тут и там, блестят как-то особенно фальшиво. Один из обитателей логова, человек с перекошенным шрамами лицом, с нескрываемым скепсисом сверлит Джай взглядом.{/n}

{n}The atmosphere in the lair is one of false excitement. The faces are sour, the smiles forced, and even the bottles of booze dotted about seem to gleam with insincerity. One of those in attendance, a man whose face is crosshatched with scars, glares at Jae with undisguised scepticism.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В логове царит атмосфера неискреннего предвкушения праздника. Лица у всех кислые, улыбки — натянутые, и даже бутылки с выпивкой, виднеющиеся тут и там, блестят как-то особенно фальшиво. Один из обитателей логова, человек с перекошенным шрамами лицом, с нескрываемым скепсисом сверлит Джай взглядом.{/n}

One of those in attendance, a man whose face is crosshatched with scars, glares at Jae with undisguised scepticism.{/n}

One of those in attendance, a man whose face is crosshatched with scars, glares at Jae with undisguised scepticism.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}藏身处中弥漫着虚假的欢庆气氛。参加聚会的人脸色阴沉，笑容勉强，就连点缀其中的酒瓶，似乎也在闪烁着虚假的光芒。在场的人之中，有个脸上布满伤疤的男人，以毫不掩饰的怀疑目光瞪着婕伊。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The atmosphere in the lair is one of false excitement. The faces are sour, the smiles forced, and even the bottles of booze dotted about seem to gleam with insincerity. One of those in attendance, a man whose face is crosshatched with scars, glares at Jae with undisguised scepticism.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}藏身处中弥漫着虚假的欢庆气氛。参加聚会的人脸色阴沉，笑容勉强，就连点缀其中的酒瓶，似乎也在闪烁着虚假的光芒。在场的人之中，有个脸上布满伤疤的男人，以毫不掩饰的怀疑目光瞪着婕伊。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}辺りの雰囲気は偽りの興奮に満ちていた。その顔は険しく、笑顔は強引に形作られたもので、点在する酒瓶さえも不誠実に輝いているように見えた。その場にいる者の一人、顔に十字の傷を負った男が、ジェイをあからさまな猜疑心をもって睨みつけた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The atmosphere in the lair is one of false excitement. The faces are sour, the smiles forced, and even the bottles of booze dotted about seem to gleam with insincerity. One of those in attendance, a man whose face is crosshatched with scars, glares at Jae with undisguised scepticism.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}辺りの雰囲気は偽りの興奮に満ちていた。その顔は険しく、笑顔は強引に形作られたもので、点在する酒瓶さえも不誠実に輝いているように見えた。その場にいる者の一人、顔に十字の傷を負った男が、ジェイをあからさまな猜疑心をもって睨みつけた。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}La atmósfera de la guarida es de emoción fingida. Las caras son amargas, las sonrisas forzadas y hasta las botellas vacías parecen relucir con falsedad. Uno de los asistentes, cuyo rostro es una red de cicatrices, mira a Jae sin ocultar su escepticismo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The atmosphere in the lair is one of false excitement. The faces are sour, the smiles forced, and even the bottles of booze dotted about seem to gleam with insincerity. One of those in attendance, a man whose face is crosshatched with scars, glares at Jae with undisguised scepticism.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La atmósfera de la guarida es de emoción fingida. Las caras son amargas, las sonrisas forzadas y hasta las botellas vacías parecen relucir con falsedad. Uno de los asistentes, cuyo rostro es una red de cicatrices, mira a Jae sin ocultar su escepticismo.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'excitation qui règne dans le repaire n'est qu'une façade. Les visages sont amers, les sourires forcés, et même les bouteilles d'alcool qui traînent un peu partout semblent briller hypocritement. Dans l'assemblée, un homme au visage rayé de cicatrices lance à Jae des regards aussi furieux que sceptiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The atmosphere in the lair is one of false excitement. The faces are sour, the smiles forced, and even the bottles of booze dotted about seem to gleam with insincerity. One of those in attendance, a man whose face is crosshatched with scars, glares at Jae with undisguised scepticism.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'excitation qui règne dans le repaire n'est qu'une façade. Les visages sont amers, les sourires forcés, et même les bouteilles d'alcool qui traînent un peu partout semblent briller hypocritement. Dans l'assemblée, un homme au visage rayé de cicatrices lance à Jae des regards aussi furieux que sceptiques.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Im Versteck herrscht Unruhe. Die Gesichter sind mürrisch, das Lächeln gezwungen und selbst die herumstehenden Schnapsflaschen scheinen vor Unaufrichtigkeit zu glänzen. Einer der Anwesenden, ein Mann mit einem von Narben übersäten Gesicht, blickt Jae mit unverhüllter Skepsis an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The atmosphere in the lair is one of false excitement. The faces are sour, the smiles forced, and even the bottles of booze dotted about seem to gleam with insincerity. One of those in attendance, a man whose face is crosshatched with scars, glares at Jae with undisguised scepticism.{/n}

Einer der Anwesenden, ein Mann mit einem von Narben übersäten Gesicht, blickt Jae mit unverhüllter Skepsis an.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}İne sahte bir heyecan hâkim. Yüzlerden düşen bin parça, gülümsemeler zoraki ve hatta dağıtılan içki şişeleri bile âdeta samimiyetsizce parıldıyor. Katılımcılar arasındaki yüzü çapraz yara izleriyle dolu bir adam, Jae'a gizleme gereği bile duymadığı bir kuşkuyla bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The atmosphere in the lair is one of false excitement. The faces are sour, the smiles forced, and even the bottles of booze dotted about seem to gleam with insincerity. One of those in attendance, a man whose face is crosshatched with scars, glares at Jae with undisguised scepticism.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İne sahte bir heyecan hâkim. Yüzlerden düşen bin parça, gülümsemeler zoraki ve hatta dağıtılan içki şişeleri bile âdeta samimiyetsizce parıldıyor. Katılımcılardan biri, yüzü çapraz yara izleriyle dolu bir adam, Jae'a gizleme gereği bile duymadığı bir kuşkuyla bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
